title: Pimco Corporate & Income Stategy Fund (PCN) Ex-Dividend Date Scheduled for September 12, 2019 - Nasdaq.com
text: Pimco Corporate & Income Stategy Fund ( PCN  ) will begin trading ex-dividend on September 12, 2019. A cash dividend payment of $0.112 per share is scheduled to be paid on October 01, 2019. Shareholders who purchased PCN prior to the ex-dividend date are eligible for the cash dividend payment. This marks the 9th quarter that PCN has paid the same dividend. At the current stock price of $18.19, the dividend yield is 7.39%.
The previous trading day's last sale of PCN was $18.19, representing a -5.51% decrease from the 52 week high of $19.25 and a 36.25% increase over the 52 week low of $13.35.
For more information on the declaration, record and payment dates, visit the PCN Dividend History  page. Our  Dividend Calendar  has the full list of stocks that have an ex-dividend today.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
